reviewText: This video does not show the different moves.  She goes right into them.  The moves are not easy to capture quickly.  She should really have a workshop video to go with this because I just gave up on it.  Very disappointed.
I chose this particular step workout I love working out with CATHe

This was a nice starter for those who are beginning, but, at times you once again you have to do a lot of stopping and starting as she moves along, however the moves will improve your strength and balance and coordination skills.  Tip: plan to watch the video first, and then walk thru it and then break it down
